note.p: Birth: St Anne's, Clontarf, County Dublin, Ireland (10 November 1847)
Death: His house in Grosvenor Place, London (07 October 1927)
Honours: Bt 1885; Baron Iveagh 1891; KP 1896; Viscount Iveagh 1905; GCVO 1910; Earl of Iveagh and Viscount Elveden 1919

Notes: Elected a Fellow as Viscount Iveagh. Since there is no mention of his election in the Candidate Book, he has been entered as a Statute 12 Fellow. His surname spelt as above, with 2 'n's, in DNB, index to BR, and R, but in BR itself has only 1 'n'.
